sn35.156:3.1: 156 The Interior and the End of Relishing
sn35.156:4.1: “Mendicants, the eye really is impermanent. A mendicant sees that it is impermanent: that’s their right view.
sn35.156:4.3: When relishing ends, greed ends. When greed ends, relishing ends.
sn35.156:4.5: When relishing and greed end, the mind is said to be well freed.
